title: Last Man Standing (1987 Action) Vernon Wells: From Asylum to Arena | A Damian Lee film

sources.title: Last Man Standing (1987 Action) Vernon Wells: From Asylum to Arena | A Damian Lee film
sources.description:
Roo Marcus trades asylum straitjackets for underground beatdowns, brawling for Napoleon’s cash while haunted by his mental institution shock therapy ghosts. When Casper and tomboy Charlie offer him a lifeline, Roo’s rage-fueled fists face off against Razor’s slick hooks and Cannon’s brute force—but can he KO his demons before they tap him out?

Original title: Last Man Standing
Alternative titles: Circleman, Manfighter

Director: Damian Lee
Writers: Damian Lee, David Mitchell

Main cast:
Vernon Wells — Roo Marcus
William Sanderson — Casper
Michael Copeman — Napoleon
Sonja Belliveau — Charlie
Frank Moore — Tenny
Réal Andrews — Razor
Franco Columbu — Batty

Genres: Action, Drama, Horror
Release date: July 14, 1987 (USA theatrical)
Filming location: Canada


Availability varies by region
